game.name: Coral Island
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 코랄 아일랜드는 활기차고 여유로운 농장 시뮬레이션을 멀티플레이어로 재해석한 게임입니다! 친구들과 함께 농사를 짓고, 동물을 키우고, 관계를 형성하고, 다양한 캐릭터와 어울리고, 마법 같은 머포크 왕국에 뛰어드는 등 자신만의 속도로 매혹적인 섬 생활을 경험해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Coral Island is a vibrant, laid-back farm sim reimagined with multiplayer! Experience enchanting island life at your own pace: farm with friends, nurture animals, build relationships, hang out with a diverse cast of characters, and dive into the magical Merfolk Kingdom.

reviewHighlights.text: I can legitimately say after over 100 hours on PC and over 100 hours on console that this is one of my favorite games of all time. There is something...
I love this game but it clearly isn't finished. It shouldn't have been taken off of "early release" when many of its features are still needing to be...
